subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After leading 3-0 and later 4-3, Aaron Heilman and then Pedro Feliciano failed the Mets in a 6-4 defeat against the Houston Astros in 10 innings on Sunday afternoon.
snippet: After leading 3-0 and later 4-3, Aaron Heilman and then Pedro Feliciano failed the Mets in a 6-4 defeat against the Houston Astros in 10 innings on Sunday afternoon.
